title: Emmerdale fans left shaken by Nate's mum's identity in Cain 'racism' scandal
text:

Nate Robinson has finally revealed the identity of his mother - and Emmerdale fans have been left shaken.

Just as it seemed that Cain Dingle was going to murder his own son in his hospital bed, Nate announced the name of his mum - Cara Robinson.

As Cain went to smother him, Nate said: "Do it, you wont get another chance. What are you waiting for, dad. Cara says 'hello' by the way."

Nate explained that Cara was his mum - but Cain denied any knowledge that she was pregnant and insisted she had never been in touch.

In a devastating twist, Faith Dingle confessed that she had covered up the baby because of "racist" Shadrach Dingle.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Baffled Cain admitted he had been dating Cara but had no idea that she had a baby.

Cain said: "Cara Robinson. Yeah I knew her. She worked at the Skinner's Arms. We went out for a while. and then one day she just disappeared."

When Nate claimed he drove his mum away, Cain insisted he had got it all wrong, but his son said he was making excuses.

Nate, who claimed Cain was too ashamed to claim him as his own son, said: "You were just a kid. Your family are racist."

(Image: ITV)

The farmhand insisted that his mum had sent Nate's letters, but Cain claimed he had not heard from her for 20 years.

Explaining how Cara was sent packing when she turned up , Nate said: "Shadrach wasn’t keen on our lot from what I heard. Coming over here corrupting nice little white boys."

Confused Cain tried to suggest that he might not be the dad as Cara "used to put it about".

But Faith made a shock appearance in the hospital room and confirmed that Nate's story was correct.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

She explained that Shadrach had threatened to burn Cara's mum's house down if she didn't leave Cain alone.

Faith said: "It would never have worked out. With a mixed race kid. It would have killed you both.

"Honestly. Cain had no idea about any of this. It was down to me and Shadrach. You’ve been getting your own back on the wrong person."

Cain warned Nate to stay away from his family, while his son told Faith to "do one".

(Image: ITV)

Emmerdale viewers took to Twitter after the big announcement - with mixed responses.

One fan said: "WHO THE F*** IS CARA?!!!"

"Faith that is a massive secret to keep from your son for over 20 odd years... But intrigued to see who this cara is, "added another.

A third said: "I wish Cara was a character already in #Emmerdale, I don't feel like I care much for the storyline if she's not already in the show"

"And now Nate will know that Cain knew nothing about him and they'll all turn on Faith which will be her exit storyline, "added a fourth.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

This came after Cain tried to murder his own son at the end of the first of tonight's episodes.

Cain paid his newly discovered son a visit in hospital - and Nate sarcastically said: "Daddy's here. My hero."

Seething Cain admitted he should have let Nate drown, but Nate continued to goad his own dad with taunts about sleeping with Moira.

(Image: ITV)

Nate said: "You couldn’t do it. Not man enough. That's why I was sleeping with your wife."

Losing his rag, Cain said: "You really don’t know how to shut your mouth," warned fuming Cain. "So let me do it for you...for good."

He closed the door, shut the blinds and grabbed a pillow, but Cain stopped in his tracks when Nate revealed the name of his mum.

*Emmerdale airs weekdays on ITV at 7pm with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm
description: Nate Robinson finally announced who his mother is - and Faith Dingle confessed she had covered up the baby bombshell
